title: Ogaki
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045732im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ogaki_sample_6717.jpg)

Hi guys, just want to let you know that my first ever commercial family is out!  
More info and samples at [Gestalten](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045732/http:/www.gestalten.com/fonts/detail/?id=ceafb21a2492d6140124b0bd68d4007e).  
And you can find some more on my Flickr stream too: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mil3n/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045732/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/mil3n/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/mil3n/")

Hope you like it!
author: milen

comments.content:
Very nice.  
Like the upright-italic of Klimax\* or something. :-)  
I hope it does well - we need stuff like this.

\* [http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/klimax](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045732/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/klimax "http://www.typotheque.com/fonts/klimax")

hhp

Thanks!  
Hrant, yes, its a little similar. By the way i like klimax as the rest of Typotheque faces, they are great!
